segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the woman is just drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, but she doesn’t seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting with her hand out, looking so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, and no one is stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and the children are so proud of themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes everything look so peaceful, but it’s not.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to slip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are working together, but they’re going to get in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
